translate.dit: 目的;利益;缘故;理由；日本清酒

values: 利益；好处；目的；缘故；理由；日本米酒；日本清酒

synonym.mean: 目的；利益；理由；日本米酒

word_group.brief_definition: 作为讨论（或论证）的基础
为了怀念往昔；为了老交情；念及旧日情分
为艺术而艺术；艺术至上主义
看在...份上；为了...；为了...着想
为了自己的利益；由于某人自身原因

bilingual.source: They were willing to sacrifice their comfort for the sake of the project.
bilingual.target: 他们愿意为了项目的成功牺牲自己的舒适。
为了满足具有现代色彩这一目的

bilingual.source: Are you ready to sacrifice your ego for the sake of the innovation?
bilingual.target: 你做好准备去为了创新的目的而牺牲自我吗？

bilingual.source: He doesn't innovate for its own sake but as a means to an end.
bilingual.target: 他并不为创新而创新，而是做一件事要达到一个目的。

bilingual.source: Vermeer would even hide the leg of an easel for the sake of composition.
bilingual.target: 弗米尔甚至会藏起画架的一条腿只为达到构图目的。

bilingual.source: “We no longer design technology just for technology’s sake, ” says Weast.
bilingual.target: “我们不再为技术目的而设计技术，”Weast称。

bilingual.source: His philosophy is "art for art's sake"- this is the Gothic literature, one of the ultimate goal.
bilingual.target: 他的理念是“为艺术而艺术”——这正是哥特式文学的最终目的之一。

bilingual.source: Let's say, just for the sake of discussion, that perfection is possible in some cases.
bilingual.target: 让我们仅仅为了讨论的目的假设在某些情况下完美是存在的，很有机会达到。

bilingual.source: What is modified ought to be the editor's demand on the contributor for the sake of publication.
bilingual.target: 编辑删改的所有内容，本质上都是编辑实施出版目的和审稿意见对作者的要求。

bilingual.source: OBJECTIVE To investigate the washing quality for years for the sake of increasing the washing quality of medical devices in Hangzhou hospitals.
bilingual.target: 目的为提高医院医疗器械清洗质量，开展了医疗器械清洗质量的调查。

list.abstract: sake（英[seɪk , ˈsɑːki]，美[seɪk , ˈsɑːki]），英语单词，名词，意思为考虑到；为了帮助某人；看在上帝分上。短语搭配有for the sake of sb（为了某人起见），例句为“Thank you for calling Sake Fifth Avenue Department Store.（感谢致电清酒第五大道百货公司。）” sake名词类近义词有goals、intention、purpose等。
Sake，电视剧《新美人计》中的角色，由措恩·金达科特饰演。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, for god's sake, Sheldon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看到老天的份上，谢尔顿。

yingyinNormal.en: For God's sake, Joey! Really.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，乔依，真的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd rather not, for the sake of this interview.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是免了，毕竟这是正式采访。

yingyinNormal.en: Do convince me. For the sake of your loved ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定要我相信。为了你爱的人们。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, buddy, for old time's sake. I'll carry him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看在以往的交情，别这样啦。我背他。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll find another. Please, for God's sake, just stop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还能找到别人的。拜托，老天，住口。

yingyinNormal.en: For heaven's sake! Why does everyone keep nagging and nagging?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，为什么大家都来唠叨我。

yingyinNormal.en: My father's disease eventually outran the cure. For goodness sake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父亲的病最终复发了，天哪。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Who I hope for her sake is not Captain Hook, so...
yingyinNormal.zh: 但愿她的妇科医生不是虎克船长...

yingyinNormal.en: Oh for god's sake, I barely touched you. How man are...
yingyinNormal.zh: 看在上帝的份上，我几乎没碰你，这人怎么……

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then I suggest you trust me for the sake of the cats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我建议你相信我，看在猫的份上。

yingyinNormal.en: Aw, for Pete's sake. Can we go now? Well, is that all of it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 让不让人活了，现在可以走了吗？全部交出来了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What? Why, for heaven's sake? Because I can't let him touch me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？天啊，为什么？因为我没法... 我不能让他碰我。

yingyinNormal.en: I wouldn't want you married off just for the sake of it. Thanks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可不想你是为了结婚而结。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course I had feelings for her. I saw her naked, for God's sake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当然对她有感情，我看了她的裸体呢，老天。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh for heaven's sake, are we to receive every Bennet in the country?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，乡下所有叫班纳特都来我们家了？

yingyinNormal.en: But is there any chance you'd go with me instead, for old times' sake?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还有机会邀你一起去吗，看在以前的份上？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, for god's sake. I kiss my mom hotter than that. He does. I seen it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看在老天的份上，我亲我妈都比那有激情。是的，我见过。

yingyinNormal.en: Lucy, for God's sake, put on a lifebelt and set a good example. Yes, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 露西，穿上救生衣，做个榜样。是，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, for God's sake, Judy, pick up the sock! Pick up the sock! Pick up the sock!
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，天啊，茱蒂，把袜子捡起来！捡起袜子！捡起袜子！

exam_freq_info.chinese: (for the sake of sth/sb)为了某人/某事起见
(for sb's/sth's sake)因某人/某事的缘故

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: for the purpose of; in the interest of; in order to achieve or preserve
sense_info_list.zh: (for the sake of sth/sb)为了某人/某事起见

sense_info_list.en: out of consideration for or in order to help someone
sense_info_list.zh: (for sb's/sth's sake)因某人/某事的缘故

sense_info_list.en: a Japanese alcoholic drink made from rice

word_usage.usage:
for the sake of sb./sth.或者for sb.'s/sth.'s sake 表示“为了某人（或某事）起见”，如：
They stayed together for the sake of the children.
为了孩子，他们还待在一起。
You can do it. Please, for my sake.
这个你是能做的。求你了，就算为了我。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the purpose of achieving or obtaining; a reason for wanting something done

examination_example.sentence: For all of our <highlight>sakes</highlight>, creativity in education, and for all, must become a priority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了我们所有人的利益，教育和所有人的创造力必须成为优先事项。

examination_example.sentence: We need to make it clear that it's not just change for change's <highlight>sake</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要明确这不仅仅是为了改变而改变。

examination_example.sentence: So, instead of innovation for innovation's <highlight>sake</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，与其为了创新而创新。

sense_info_list.en: a Japanese alcoholic drink made from fermented rice, traditionally drunk warm in small porcelain cups

examination_example.sentence: Thank you for calling <highlight>Sake</highlight> Fifth Avenue Department Store.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感谢致电清酒第五大道百货公司。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the purpose of achieving or obtaining; a reason for wanting something done

examination_example.sentence: Student teachers score higher on tests than pupils who're learning only for their own <highlight>sake</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实习老师在考试中比那些只为自己而学习的学生得分更高。

examination_example.sentence: We should be delighted to pursue knowledge for its own <highlight>sake</highlight>—even when what we find out is something we didn't want to know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该为追求知识这件事本身而感到高兴——即使我们学到的东西可能并不是我们想知道的。

examination_example.sentence: We should feel happy when we pursue knowledge for knowledge's <highlight>sake</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们为了知识而追求知识时，我们应该感到快乐。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示想要达到的目的、结果。
表示事情发生的直接原因。

direction_info.description:

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
